author: Sam-Harper
body:
#### PR description:

Changes to reduce the event size for the HLT TDR. Drops it from 117MB -> 80MB an event on TTBar

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:
backport of  https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/30899  necessary for HLT TDR production
title: changes needed for HLT TDR event content : 11_1
